file_content.text: Get away! I've done nothing to you--I've touched nothing on this dustball... talked to no one!
Are you Vyord Yanol?
Hello?
You know who I am. You wouldn't be here otherwise.
Don't worry, you're safe.
Grab anything you need and start moving. We're not staying here.
You're coming with me.
Insolent child... don't touch me. Stay back.
The Dark Council hired you, didn't it? Or the Galactic Republic? The Mecrosa Order? The Hutts?
It doesn't matter--my master is dead. Darth Jadus is gone. I have no one left to betray!
I'm not asking you to betray anyone. Darth Zhorrid sent me.
I'm with Jadus's daughter.
Zhorrid? Ha! The idiot girl thinks she can equal her father, eh?
No outsiders involved--I'm with Imperial Intelligence.
I'm here on the job.
Intelligence? Ha! Precocious meddlers. Not much better than the idiot girl Zhorrid.
I don't have time for diplomacy right now. You need to listen to me.
Shut up and cooperate.
You really don't understand. Lord Jadus must have made preparations for his death. He was power, and fire and brilliance.
The instant the master died, I promise--his contingency plans went into action. They'll bring doom to everything Lord Jadus ever touched... and I want no part of it.
What kind of contingency plans?
Contingency plans?
I don't know what he arranged... but Jadus would never let his death go unpunished.
Please. There are things you know--things no one else does.
I need your help.
In another time, another place, I might have done you a favor. I would have owned you. But not anymore.
I won't be caught in the master's schemes--ever again!
No choice. [Subdue him]
Fool! Everyone Jadus ever touched--we'll all be destroyed.
We can sedate him, if necessary--but we'll have to carry him to the ship.
Still alive, but he's not getting up soon. Now we have to drag him to the ship.
Let's load him up and get going.
That's fine.
Very well.
Yeah. You know, you'd think a high-up advisor would carry a few more credits....
He's just a terrified old man.
Be gentle with him.
Of course. But we should be careful--if he awakens, he could become dangerous.
Right. I'm sure he's a real sweetie, what with working for Jadus.
I'm not giving him to Zhorrid.
I can't allow it. [Kill him]
We're... surprised you'd do such a thing to an Imperial advisor. But if you say it was necessary....
Works for me. You can tell Zhorrid he slipped and fell down the stairs....
We won't... the master will destroy everything... even from death.
Sure he will. Let's go.
Uh-huh.
Don't worry. I'll wake you when we get to Dromund Kaas.
You'll be alright.
I can't let Zhorrid have you. It's nothing personal.
Goodbye. [Kill him]
Guards--protect me!
Get away. Get away from here!
You have no part in this. Get away.
